titles.ar: كِتَابُ الْأَيْمَانِ وَ النُّذُورِ وَ الْكَفَّارَاتِ
titles.en: THE BOOK OF OATHS, AND THE VOWS, AND THE EXPIATIONS

titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يُحْلَفُ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ وَ مَنْ لَمْ يَرْضَ [بِاللَّهِ] فَلَيْسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ
titles.en: Chapter 4 – There is no swearing except by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and the one who is not pleased with Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so is not from Allah<sup>azwj</sup>

titles.ar: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ الْيَمِينِ بِالْبَرَاءَةِ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَ رَسُولِهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله )
titles.en: Chapter 5 – Abhorrence for (swearing of) the oath with the disavowing from Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and His<sup>azwj</sup> Rasool<sup>saww</sup>

titles.ar: كِتَابُ الْأَيْمَانِ وَ النُّذُورِ وَ الْكَفَّارَاتِ
titles.en: THE BOOK OF OATHS, AND THE VOWS, AND THE EXPIATIONS

titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يُحْلَفُ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ وَ مَنْ لَمْ يَرْضَ [بِاللَّهِ] فَلَيْسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ
titles.en: Chapter 4 – There is no swearing except by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and the one who is not pleased with Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so is not from Allah<sup>azwj</sup>

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن أو موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (4/312)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مَنْصُورِ بْنِ يُونُسَ عَنْ أَبِي حَمْزَةَ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) لَا تَحْلِفُوا إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ وَ مَنْ حَلَفَ بِاللَّهِ فَلْيَصْدُقْ وَ مَنْ حُلِفَ لَهُ بِاللَّهِ فَلْيَرْضَ وَ مَنْ حُلِفَ لَهُ بِاللَّهِ فَلَمْ يَرْضَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Mansour Bin Yunus, from Abu Hamza,

(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘Do not swear an oath except by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and the one who swears an oath by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so let him be ratified, and the one for whom an oath is sworn by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so let him be pleased (with it), and the one for whom an oath is sworn by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so he is not pleased, so he is not from Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Mansur ibn Yunus from abu Hamzah who has narrated the following: “Ali ibn al-Husayn, ‘Alayhim al-Salam, has said that the Messenger of Allah, O Allah, grant compensation to Muhammad and his family worthy of their services to Your cause, has said, ‘Do not swear except by Allah and one who swears by Allah must be considered truthful. One must agree with an oath by Allah. If one does not agree with an oath by Allah, is not of Allah, most Majestic, most Glorious.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (4/313)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ أَبِي أَيُّوبَ الْخَزَّازِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: مَنْ حَلَفَ بِاللَّهِ فَلْيَصْدُقْ وَ مَنْ لَمْ يَصْدُقْ فَلَيْسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَ مَنْ حُلِفَ لَهُ بِاللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فَلْيَرْضَ وَ مَنْ لَمْ يَرْضَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from usman Bin Isa, from Abu Ayoub Al Khazzaz,

(It has been narrated) from Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who swears by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so let him be ratified, and the one who does not ratify, so he is not from Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and the one for whom an oath is sworn by Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic, so let him be pleased (with it), and the one who is not pleased, so he is not from Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic’.
en.sarwar: 2. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ‘Uthman ibn ‘Isa from abu Ayyub al-Khazzaz who has narrated the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘If one swears by Allah it must be considered true, if one does not believe he is not of Allah. One must agree with an oath by Allah, if he does do so he is not of Allah, most Majestic, most Glorious.’”
